name: Sky Hunter: Royal Rumble
description:
Are you and family are bored at home and want play some family game ?

Sky Hunter : Royal Rumble is the answer. This game is retro arcade plane gaming and can played up to 7 players at the same time at the same screen.

Recommend using android TV or Android tablet as Screen for more fun with your family or friends.

If any suggestion or error please reach me via email.

Thanks you for playing this game.
